head.abstracts: Â© 2023, The Author(s), under exclusive license to Springer Nature Switzerland AG.As may be expected the modification of the QFT to a localized QWT only formed the beginning of a rich field of novel quaternionic integral transforms, that often are motivated by generalizing known scalar integral transforms to higher dimensions, taking advantage of how quaternions geometrically meaningfully and efficiently combine several signal components. This chapter is devoted to survey these new types of quaternionic integral transforms.

coredata.dc:description: As may be expected the modification of the QFT to a localized QWT only formed the beginning of a rich field of novel quaternionic integral transforms, that often are motivated by generalizing known scalar integral transforms to higher dimensions, taking advantage of how quaternions geometrically meaningfully and efficiently combine several signal components. This chapter is devoted to survey these new types of quaternionic integral transforms.
coredata.dc:title: Further Quaternion Integral Transforms
